title: CIE Level 1 Doubt
content: CIE is offering a 2 credit special topic course which is "Getting started with entrepreneurship" . They have mentioned that they will be selecting students based on OAT ( Online assesment test) . Any idea what type of questions or subjects related questions will be asked ?

comments.body: Dw they will select u if u fill the form . It will be generic questions abt entrepreneurship, it's a 2 credit special topic kind of course. If u take it u won't be able to take other special topics
